医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
英国 NHS 创新药物基金：尽早获得新药的方法存在缺陷一项旨在帮助患者快速获得具有潜在价值的新药的新基金可能会激励制药行业开发高价药物，用于治疗临床益处证据薄弱的罕见疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/NHS-Englands-Innovative-Medicines-Fund-A-flawed-approach-to-early-access-to-new-medicines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/NHS-Englands-Innovative-Medicines-Fund-A-flawed-approach-to-early-access-to-new-medicines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=545154c9-1603-4cd1-a0e5-f2e3f42adada Fri, 25 Aug 2023 12:16:58 -0400 NHS England's Innovative Medicines Fund: A flawed approach to early access to new medicines
16 年来，英国 AF 患者的心脑血管死亡率有所下降新研究发现，与本世纪初相比，患有英国最常见心律疾病之一的患者死于心脏病或中风的可能性降低了 50%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Cardio-or-cerebroangio-mortality-of-AF-患者-has-declined-in-the-UK-over-16-years.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Cardio-or-cerebroangio-mortality-of-AF-患者-has-declined-in-the-UK-over-16-years.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1de952c6-c6d2-4fd3-a4f6-0beb691f21ae Fri, 25 Aug 2023 10:54:00 -0400 Cardio or cerebrovascular mortality of AF patients has declined in the UK over 16 years
英国生物银行痴呆症风险评分优于其他广泛使用的评分开放获取期刊 BMJ 上发表的一项大型长期研究表明，新的痴呆症风险评分采用了 11 个大多可改变的风险因素，可识别中年以后在未来 14 年内面临罹患该疾病风险的人群精神健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/UK-Biobank-Dementia-Risk-Score-outperforms-other-widely-used-scores.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/UK-Biobank-Dementia-Risk-Score-outperforms-other-widely-used-scores.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51a1a0d3-1eb8-422d-96f5-6294cf49886a Fri, 25 Aug 2023 10:47:26 -0400 UK Biobank Dementia Risk Score outperforms other widely used scores
“我们想要的只是复仇”：社交媒体如何助长青少年枪支暴力16 年来，胡安·坎波斯 (Juan Campos) 一直致力于拯救高危青少年免遭枪支暴力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/e28098All-we-want-is-revengee28099-How-social-media-fuels-gun-violence-among-teens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/e28098All-we-want-is-revengee28099-How-social-media-fuels-gun-violence-among-teens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e2afa10-0738-4659-969f-3850b5516987 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 10:41:19 -0400 ‘All we want is revenge’: How social media fuels gun violence among teens
今天在线发布新的 ESC 心肌病指南欧洲心脏病学会 (ESC) 心肌病指南今天在《欧洲心脏杂志》在线发表。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/New-ESC-Guidelines-on-cardiomyopathies-published-online-today.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/New-ESC-Guidelines-on-cardiomyopathies-published-online-today.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=46030270-4ced-4e5a-8d9b-205cff34897b Fri, 25 Aug 2023 10:37:50 -0400 New ESC Guidelines on cardiomyopathies published online today
新发布的 ESC 指南提供了急性冠状动脉综合征的全面概述欧洲心脏病学会 (ESC) 关于急性冠脉综合征的指南今天在《欧洲心脏杂志》在线发表。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Newly-published-ESC-Guidelines-provide-compressive-overview-of-acute-coronary-syndromes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Newly-published-ESC-Guidelines-provide-compressive-overview-of-acute-coronary-syndromes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97f48650-0780-41a2-a79e-a35a3071c1ae Fri, 25 Aug 2023 10:33:04 -0400 Newly published ESC Guidelines provide comprehensive overview of acute coronary syndromes
研究人员发现蛋白质如何调节细胞中的“跑步”基因组调控中心 (CRG) 的研究人员发现了蛋白质如何协同工作来调节“跑步机”，这是细胞内微管网络用来确保细胞正确分裂的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Researchers-discover-how- Proteins-regulate-treadmilling-in-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Researchers-discover-how- Proteins-regulate-treadmilling-in-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67e745f8-0257-4a1c-ab01-32724f3f956e Fri, 25 Aug 2023 10:11:58 -0400 Researchers discover how proteins regulate 'treadmilling' in cells
将戒烟护理纳入肺癌筛查可提高戒烟率肺癌是美国最致命的癌症，80% 的肺癌死亡与一个危险因素有关：吸烟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Integrating-tobacco-cessation-care-into-lung-cancer-screening-improves-quit-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/Integrating-tobacco-cessation-care-into-lung-cancer-screening-improves-quit-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=56faf518-b7c2-4180-bad5-84d0de64635a Fri, 25 Aug 2023 10:08:13 -0400 Integrating tobacco cessation care into lung cancer screening improves quit rates
肝性脑病治疗费用高昂可能导致患者不依从药物治疗明尼苏达大学医学院和药学院的研究人员发现，终末期肝病患者肝性脑病治疗的高费用与患者治疗保留率的降低有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/High-cost-of-hepatic-encephalopathy-treatment-may-lead-to-medication-non-adherence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/High-cost-of-hepatic-encephalopathy-treatment-may-lead-to-medication-non-adherence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e13d9f2-d783-4f54-a369-252601ba2e67 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 10:04:13 -0400 High cost of hepatic encephalopathy treatment may lead to medication non-adherence
研究显示，ChatGPT 3.5 在三分之一的病例中提供了不适当的癌症治疗建议对于许多患者来说，互联网是进行医学主题自我教育的强大工具。随着 ChatGPT 现已触手可及，来自麻省总医院布里格姆医疗保健系统创始成员布莱根妇女医院的研究人员评估了人工智能聊天机器人提供的癌症治疗建议是否符合国家综合癌症网络 (NCCN) 指南的一致性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/ChatGPT-35-provides-inproperty-cancer-treatment-recommendations-in-one-third-of-cases-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230825/ChatGPT-35-provides-inproperty-cancer-treatment-recommendations-in-one-third-of-cases-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa983216-6e48-447d-b3d4-568909e64627 Fri, 25 Aug 2023 09:47:19 -0400 ChatGPT 3.5 provides inappropriate cancer treatment recommendations in one-third of cases, study shows
